head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NOONAN, MARYANN K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NOONAN, MARYANN K.

block.p: NOONAN-Maryann K. On August 28, 2000 of New York, NY, formerly of Garden City , NY. Beloved daughter of James Noonan and the late Mary Noonan. Loving sister of James C., Marybeth, Brian, Trisha and Daniel. Dear aunt of four nephews. Also survived by many other loving relatives and friends. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave at 12th St. Garden City, Wednesday and Thursday 2-5 and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial St. Joseph's RC Church, Garden City, Friday 11AM. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, donations to St. Joseph's School, 450 Franklin Ave, Garden City, NY 11530, appreciated.
